description: The Department of Public Safety and Correctional Services (DPSCS) and Motor Vehicle Administration (MVA) work with DPSCS Corrections inmates to provide them with MVA identification. Lacking state or federal ID is a major challenge for returning citizens to obtain housing and employment, and this program helps them to overcome this hurdle. ID issuance pre-release is targeted, but MVA also offers post-release IDs to former inmates at offices to MVA's branches.

name: MVA IDs Issued to DPSCS Inmates through the Released Inmate Identification Program (RIID)
